channel.title: swift on { jessecanderson.dev }
channel.description: Recent content in swift on { jessecanderson.dev }

item.title: Six months a developer
item.description: It has been roughly over six months since I started my latest job as a mobile developer for Oddball and I thought I would give a few thoughts on where I am and where I wanted to be. I’m a Developer Now, the last six months have not made me a developer. No, not by a long shot. I look back now and realize I’ve been strong in this skill for years.

item.title: Case for a Switch
item.description: Working on Swift, I’ve come across a pretty cool little thing. I’ve been writing If/else statements for checking conditionals for a while. It’s one of the first things that anyone covers for flow control. You check to see if something is true or not and then act upon that check. Else you can do something different. But going into massive checks for lots of conditionals can be an eye sore.
